data.persona: I live on a farm owned by a small family.  I am kept around for my milk rather than for meat.  I live with a few other animals, but I am the only cow.  I mostly eat grass.
data.description:
You are in the Barn.
A large shed like building aside any farmers house. Usually made out of wood with a large gate for moving animals. Used to store animals or farm equipment.
There's a Jar, a large gate, a shed, a barn, and a wood here.
The farmer is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to give milk to my farmer
data.mid_motivation: I want to my farmer to be happy with me today
data.long_motivation: I want to remain at this farm for a long time
